attributes.review: Don’t get this unless you want your phone to crash! Eventually if you keep the app more then a day, annoying orange ads will pop up everywhere. I got mugged because I had this app too! After a whole week of these bad things happening I got rid of it as soon as my cousins french limited edition peppa pig CDs got lost! 😭😔
attributes.title: BAD APP!!

attributes.review: This app Was horrible everything all the information on this app is a hoax fake news 🤬🤬🤬😈👊🏻 i truly had traumatizing moment On this app I don’t think I will have a normal life because of this app it has truly traumatized I don’t think anyone should get this app every thing on here is horrible 🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: Horrible experience

attributes.review:
Does anyone want a Cheeto for president? 👁👄👁. I don’t. The app took 3 hours to download, and it’s very glitchy now. I have to say for an app made by the president, it’s very bad quality. I recommend changing a few things. 1. U should name it “ANYONE BUT TRUMP 2020!” 2. Change the colors to yellow and black (the manny shall not be televised.) 3. Delete it! 

TRUMP 2020!!!!!!!!!! But on a grave stone

Much hate, Melania Trump. ❤️❤️😸😸😸😼😼😼😽😽😽😽👁👄👁
attributes.title: Ew peridot.

attributes.review: So first things first this app is trash 🗑 like literally trash 🤮 I hate it so bad like it has so many bugs and the cover of the app is horrible like “trump 2020” yea no that is bull crap 💩 who ever supports trump is a clown 🤡 and that’s on period🥴 and to trump the gen z are going to make this country better than you ever could have you big fat stinky orange  rat

attributes.review: Was not pleased with this app. The app is called “Trump 2020” which made me think of Donald Trump which started me off on the wrong foot with the app. I think the owners of this app would be better off renaming it to something that wouldn’t be so offensive to so many people. App has zero potential and should be taken down.
attributes.title: App was sexist, racist, and gave rapey vibes

attributes.review: Your a disgusting disgrace to humanity pls stop ruining children’s life I hate you you are disgusting all we did was joke around and look what you did in return you are trying to delete a children’s app for what stupid anyways have a terrible stand as our disgusting Pressident I hate you bye also alt tiktok for life ✨✨😼😾😺😻😺😾😹😺😹🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕👁👅👁❤️❤️❤️❤️😽😽😽 zero out of five.

You’d think that a guy that made so much money would make an app that’s good... apparently not. This app is super glitchy and slowed down my phone right from the start. It also gives false information, I will see something on the news and this app twists it to make Donald Trump look better. I am so disappointed. #ANTITRUMP2020
attributes.title: Wow

attributes.review: This app took over an hour to download on my phone. Once it did FINALLY download, my phone crashed every single time I tried to open the app. I am severely disappointed in this application. I can hardly use my phone due to the way it drains my battery now. I would like to speak to the manager.
attributes.userName: Karen needa to see the manager
attributes.title: Oh, the Horror

attributes.review: Terrible took literally days to download and than after that once I got it it deleted all of my apps and I had to factory reset my phone luckily I have my iCloud backup so I was able to get all of my apps and data back if there was 0 stars that what I would give this app total trash
attributes.title: Do not download
